 car make -- average price
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)

tc <- read_csv("tc.csv")
ordered_grouped_make <- tc %>%
  group_by(Make) %>%
  summarise(average = mean(Price)) %>%
  arrange(desc(average))
write.csv(ordered_grouped_make, file = "ordered_grouped_make.csv")
```
